article.Heading: Budget 2016: Jaitley has 'cleverly' made Opp's job difficult, says Omar
article.Summary: "By not focusing the benefits of #UnionBudget2016 on the #suitboot (reference to corporate) people, @arunjaitley has cleverly made the opposition's job a bit tougher," Omar Abdullah tweeted.
article.Body:
Finance Minister Arun Jaitley has "cleverly" made opposition parties' job difficult by not making Corporate sector the focus of the Union budget, former Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister Omar Abdullah said today.

"By not focusing the benefits of #UnionBudget2016 on the #suitboot (reference to corporate) people, @arunjaitley has cleverly made the opposition's job a bit tougher," Omar tweeted.

The BJP-led NDA government has been accused by opposition parties, including the Congress, of favouring the Corporate sector.
